document.text:
Subject: update 
Date: Mon, 09 Dec 2019 23:49:07 +0000 
We wanted to share the good news that we spoke with lawyer late this afternoon, and he told us that his 
client is on board with cooperating with our office's investigation and possible prosecution of Ghislaine Maxwell. Our next 
step will be to meet with for an interview to cover several topics that were previously off-limits during our 
meetings with her. We hope to have that meetin:4 or the week thereafter, depending on her 
schedule. 
Best, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
One Saint Andrew's Plaza 
New York, NY 10007 
EFTA00018924
